You are welcome!
 From now on, you are in the game. 
You have three hours. At the end of time you will lose. But you can replenish your time with the help of other players or NOT using your phone.
 Yes, yes, this is the game you need to play without a phone. I hope you understand what you need to do to win and…

This is a game - an experiment.\nWe want to help people who are dependent on their smartphones.\n The goal of the game is to hold out for 25 day 4 hr. 48 min.. This is not a random value. This is one thousandth of the average life expectancy of a person. You have to accelerate "live" your life, "earning" your time. I hope you will learn to appreciate your time and the time of others.
